website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice if you like the idea of glass bakeware; otherwise you might want to consider others we reviewed.
pros: Constructed of non-porous glass for safe cooking and easy cleaning
Features large handles that are easy to grip
cons: Our testers noted that the lids are flimsy and have the tendency to crack

customer_reviews.title: Bowl Lids
customer_reviews.text: I love them, but I didn't get the lids to my bowls... This thing says I get lids to them? How do I get them??? Update: If you do order these, it is a pain trying to get the manufacturer to send you ALL the pieces. They have been giving me the run around for weeks. They needed pics of the set, and NOW want my ID? I didn't need an ID when i bought them, why now? What a waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Chavez

customer_reviews.title: cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I do not like to write bad reviews, but this quality is soo bad that I have to! Glass is ok but the LIDS!!! OMG! their quality is worse that 99c store one, it doesn't close properly so if something liquid it will be spilled, food will not be safe and it will be spoiled. SAVE your money. When I received and opened and saw the lids quality I immediately started return process still did not hear back from sellers ( been over 6 month) so I used them but need to purchase something that can used as lids
customer_reviews.author: Nokia fan

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper by the set, look for the older model; comes with more lids and usable pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set, plenty of lids for all thepieces except the pie dish and custard cups. Dishwasher, oven and microwave safe. Note: (Just remember to remove the lids when using in the oven or microwave)
customer_reviews.author: Scott R Gabriele

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the handles! Awesome set!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set of glass bake ware and a set of mixing bowls plus this set has a set of small dessert bowls? Love this set soooo much! BUY IT!!! GREAT value! Each piece of bake ware at my local grocer is about $12-$15 and no covers.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetFreaK

customer_reviews.title: using the glass handles, it is easy to place the dish in-and-out of the oven
customer_reviews.text: The Pyrex brand is without question the best, in my opinion. However, the brand is only half the story, as an elderly couple, our finger grip is not as good as it was. We purchased this design for the brand, and just as important, the handles on the larger dishes. We have not been disappointed, using the glass handles, it is easy to place the dish in-and-out of the oven, back and forth to the table, and just as important to me...easy cleanup, without breaking the glass. Also, the smaller dishes have nice edges that are easy to handle, with out loosing your grip. I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: P. ohare

customer_reviews.title: I love all my pyrex products
customer_reviews.text: I love all my pyrex products, so I happily bought this set. However, the new lid design is awful. They don't snap down completely, one side always pops up and the food on that side drys out in the fridge. I've tried placing something heavy on top of it, but the lids still pop up. The circular ones are fine, just the rectangle lids malfunction.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Furr

customer_reviews.title: Do not place pryex on top of stove
customer_reviews.text: Simply do not place your Pyrex on top of the stove before or after the cooking process. Most importantly when your stove / oven is hot or preheating - do not put your Pyrex on it. Place your Pyrex on a potholder or trivet. Do this, and your Pyrex will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good dishes but lids suck. 3.5/5
customer_reviews.text: Really like the dishes themselves but some of the lids aren’t that great. Still gonna have to put plastic wrap over the food before putting lid on because they don’t close properly. At least on the larger squarish dishes. The circle ones seems to fit ok.
customer_reviews.author: Annessa

customer_reviews.title: 19 minus 4 or 5
customer_reviews.text: I think I'm being generous with this rating. After 3 attempts, I finally have a bake set. First order was missing the bowl lids and had a cracked lid. The second set found another owner. The third set was only 15 pieces. The bowls still have no lids, but the lids I do have aren't cracked. I haven't used the set yet so I don't have any melting or exploding stories.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I'm excited about my new Pyrex set but it arrived missing 2 lids. It was a good price so I don't want to return & exchange...etc.over $25. But hopefully Amazon will read this review & send me the missing lids...
customer_reviews.author: Piper Appleton

customer_reviews.title: Great value if you are careful with the lids.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with this product. However, the lids fit very flimsily and will pop off if lightly hit from the side. Great price for the overall product but not very well designed lids.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce in ATL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baking and leftovers
customer_reviews.text: We love using our Pyrex containers for leftovers and baking! I like the fact that there are lids for most of them. It makes t easy for storage purposes.
customer_reviews.author: cbrowell

customer_reviews.title: Still using them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife back in 2014. She is still using them to this day. Can't go wrong with Pyrex.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: This set of Pyrex has worked well for me so far. I have used all parts of the set and I read reviews of where the lids did not fit but mine fit just fine. I have no complaints with my Pyrex set. In fact this makes cooking for me easier, the glass bowls are awesome for mixing ingredients and the casserole pans are great for, well casseroles and the square pan is awesome for making brownies.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Lids are brittle
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, but lids are brittle plastic and one was cracked, ordered replacement set and same lid in it was cracked and chipped (11x7in). Very disappointed because this was for a Christmas gift. Hopefully the glass components are better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gingi

customer_reviews.title: This Pyrex set is great. it seems to be well made
customer_reviews.text: This Pyrex set is great. it seems to be well made. We have taken casseroles from the fridge to the oven and then back to the fridge with the included covers. That is a great convenience. One note, it did arrive with some damaged pieces. I contacted the manufacture and they quickly replaced the pieces in question
customer_reviews.author: S. Hick

customer_reviews.title: very dissapointed that one of the covers were smashed and ...
customer_reviews.text: very dissapointed that one of the covers were smashed and broken, covers seem brittle compared to the covers for the mixing bowls, will have to deal with it as Im not returning 14 pieces for a refund
customer_reviews.author: pat L

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Beware, obviously used and had scratches and small broken pieces of glass around the rim of the bowls with several missing lids. Some of the pieces could be salvaged and appear nice, however in view of the broken pieces of glass I do not feel comfortable using. Not as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Beth D

customer_reviews.title: Great basic set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basic set at a super price! The lids are a great addition since you can now store leftovers right in the pan instead of dirtying a storage container. The only pieces that do not have lids are the small bowls and the pie pan. Easy cleanup!
customer_reviews.author: Nini

customer_reviews.title: amazing.
customer_reviews.text: these are perfect for baking and left over storage. the only reason they didn't get 5 stars is because they are sooo heavy. i like how strong they are, but after you get some food in them they get really impossible to move. not impossible, but a lot harder than you'd expect. they are easy to clean up, however one of mine stained. not sure how. all the other ones are perfect. just that one little booger is stained.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Hockey

customer_reviews.title: Great deal so far
customer_reviews.text: These are a great bargain. I've spent more on 'off brand' bakeware before and they did not have tight fighting covers.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Guillemette

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this set, and I love the price I got it for. The only thing that I do not care for, is two lids not being the same color blue or texture as the others. I did not want to go through the hassle o trying to replace two lids, so decided just to keep the set.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Advertisement is not what you get
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! I ordered this set for the casserole pans and the pie dish, but instead was sent a set with 2 (2!) casserole pans, no pie dish, and a bunch of small bowls. Not what was advertised at all!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing food
customer_reviews.text: We like to use glass tuberware and it works great to reheat leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen must have
customer_reviews.text: The set is a baker's dream. I love that most items come with its own lid. Pyrex is durable and sturdy. The set is great. I have used all of them. I especially love the four little bowls. I do wish it came with a second pie plate
customer_reviews.author: jiggleee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are great for baking, cooking, and storing. They also clean up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: NOT Pyrex. Already exploded under 1 yr
customer_reviews.text: Obviously NOT Pyrex. One dish has already exploded. Scared to use others.
customer_reviews.author: jake smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: super great! not sure if It came without a lid or I lost one immediately when it arrived... so that's a bit of a bummer, but otherwise you can't go wrong with this set. it kind of stacks nicely, but the stacking gets bit is a little awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Brookeacc

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive lids
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive all the lids I was purchased, which made this product only half work. The ones missing lids can't be used as storage containers in the fridge. This is not what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: House of Cups

customer_reviews.title: One of the lids was broken and I didn't want ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids was broken and I didn't want to try and pack all of this up to send back.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Blair

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but was missing half of the kids out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mcmillion

customer_reviews.title: Great set, unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.text: Pyrex quality and the blue lids look good. Amazon has the best deals because this same set was much more expensive in retail stores, my wife seems to love them. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse G.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: After months of waiting to use these, I finally opened the box and pulled each of the glassware out. 2 of the mixing bowls are missing their cover.
customer_reviews.author: Here202

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this set, I couldn't wait to cook with them. The lids fit nice and tight. Love the variety in sizes that come with this set. My first shipment came with a broken piece, but it was replace and I received it the next day. The picture shows that the small mixing bowl have a lid, though I didn't receive a lid for it. Its not a big deal so I am not worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: amazing idea
customer_reviews.text: best idea ever.i finally got to throw out all those miscellaneous mixing bowls. no more searching for lasagna storage!!!
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the old ones
customer_reviews.text: Do you remember those days when all Pyrex glassware was thicker and good for baking? These days I have to look on the bottom to see if it's oven-safe. The lids do not seal very well.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: GOOD QUALITY DISHES/STORAGE CONTAINERS/COOKING SUPPLIES. I LOVE THESE AND THE LIDS THAT COME WITH THEM, YOU WIL TOO IF YOU ORDER THESE GREAT PRICE TOO, VERY INEXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.author: SAVO4LIFE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: awesome variety of containers. Very good quality and easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Cheka Handal

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter set for a new couple or a replacement set for an older couple! Just what you need for your baking/cooking needs!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie J. Greeney

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: Glass bakeware is a necessity in our household, and the easy grab collection fits the bill. I hate scrabbling with the oven door open, awkwardly grasping these heavy dishes. The handles make the project run smoothly, eliminating the fear of dropping the pan or burning your hands. It's also great to have the secure-fit lids for transport and fridge storage. You get more than you probably need with this set, but it's worth the extra luxuries for the reasonable price of $38. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: caileigh

customer_reviews.title: Functional Storage
customer_reviews.text: I like that they can be stored in one another, however the lids could have been a tighter fit to ensure nothing is spilled.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Glass pieces are good. Two of the round plastic covers weren't even ...
customer_reviews.text: Glass pieces are good. Two of the round plastic covers weren't even in the box and two of the rectangle plastic covers were cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Sky J.

customer_reviews.title: big and medium round ones came with no lid
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the big and medium round ones came with no lid
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this set from Pyrex. I know I will have it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Review Maker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my pans easy to clean and dishwasher safe. Great buy very pleased with quality
customer_reviews.author: latoya

customer_reviews.title: Smooth as silk.
customer_reviews.text: arrived as described and works like a charm. no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Keil F. Nitz

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this set! I use these on a daily basis! Love the bowls, use them for mixing. And I just love that each piece comes with a cover! The little tiny bowls don't come with covers. But they're great for sauces or ice cream! Only negative is that some of the lids, on the bakeware aren't as tight as I'd want them to be, but then again it's not supposed to be tupperware ;P
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome minus the fact that I bought this for ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome minus the fact that I bought this for Christmas cooking so I just opened it and one of my lids was broke
customer_reviews.author: Johannah

customer_reviews.title: Love Pyrex
customer_reviews.text: Use these all the time. My granddaughter loves them because of their weight.
customer_reviews.author: tina winn

customer_reviews.title: great set!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sizes that come available in this set. They've done a great job of putting together the perfect set of dishes for anything you need in the kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Pyrex
customer_reviews.text: Lately, I have become very aware that baking or heating in plastics even BPA free ones is not a good thing to do. For the most part I have always baked in glass or metal. But I have microwaved in plastic before. No more! This set of Pyrex bakeware is wonderful. I love the variety of shapes, some of which I have but will use none the less. One of the best features is that almost all come with lids for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Snowshoe

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3 Lids
customer_reviews.text: Good quality bake ware, no problems with the pieces themselves and the packaging was good. The only problem i have with the set is that i am missing the lids for all 3 bowls that came with the set. If all the pieces were in the box i would have given a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for an amazing price! It came very well packaged, with extra secure wrapping inside Love these dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Emolyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of sizes and i love the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: Most of the set was fine but there was a lid that was completely cracked ...
customer_reviews.text: Most of the set was fine but there was a lid that was completely cracked and completely unusable. I would definitely not order from World Kitchen again.
customer_reviews.author: Z-man

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pyrex set! The was grab sides and lids for all the containers are so convenient. Makes it easy to store leftovers.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C

customer_reviews.title: Great Set, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Pyrex. This is the best set I've ever gotten. Everything that needs lids has them. Every useful Pyrex dish is in here. They are definitely good looking enough to serve food in and, with the lids, perfect for potlucks. All the baking dishes in the set have extra long lips on the end and handle holes making them super easy to take in and out of a low oven. This set is much cheaper on Amazon than other places you can find it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This set was a gift for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful. Glad the handles were added
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful. Glad the handles were added. Lids seem much sturdier than my old set
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but...
customer_reviews.text: Great set, but 1 lid was cracked when it arrived, Wayfair made it right though, so have no fear since lids seem to be the issue in the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Love that Pyrex
customer_reviews.text: Of all the kitchenware I own, I love the versatility of Pyrex products. Heat it, freeze it, chill it, nuke it; it just keeps giving for years. This set is the perfect fit for most any need and I would recommend it to anyone. Only issue is that the lids are a little bit of a pain to fit, especially for the rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The "easy grab" handles are great. The lids do not fit air tight on the rectangular or square items, but they do cover enough for short storage in the refrigerator. Compared to other "chef" endorsed easy grab pans, these are just as nice and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Simple Sally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set for the price. Will buy this again for future gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna R.

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex..... need I say more??
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for Christmas and she LOVED them!!! No issues at all.... arrived earlier than expected and no flaws or damage. Pyrex is TERRIFIC!!!! Would DEF buy these again if I can find them for the same price.... but for me this time and not my sister in law lol
customer_reviews.author: Harleylov

customer_reviews.title: Glass is way to go
customer_reviews.text: Great for mixing and saving then cooking or heating all in the same bowl or dish. Theres no plastic taste and easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Broken Lid
customer_reviews.text: One of the lids that came was broken but Pyrex is just a very good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: By Far the Best !
customer_reviews.text: I just received this Pyrex Set as a a gift. They are by far the best set of Bake ware set i have ever come across. I am soo excited to bake with them each and every day
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the other reviews of the lids. They don't really 'fit' with any tight grip. It's more like they sit on top of the glassware. For the money though, I would definitely buy this set again. It came with so many great kitchen staples for a bargain price. I haven't experienced any exploding glass yet, but I've also only used the pieces a couple times each.
customer_reviews.author: Young professional MA

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of bakeware. Lids fit well and it is nice to have something that goes from the frig straight to the oven or microwave without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Reed

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: So far the best set for the price. I visited a store in town that sell the same name brand but with less items at a much higher price. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: It's a bummer that it's not better. Don't drop them cuz also it shatters and ...
customer_reviews.text: These lids leak, the break, and won't last. It's a bummer that it's not better. Don't drop them cuz also it shatters and crazy hard to clean up safely.
customer_reviews.author: MammothLover

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I received this set a few days ago, I've tested all of the lids and already baked with a few of them. As far as I can tell this product is of great quality. And for all of the people complaining about one of the lids not fitting, I believe that was just a one batch problem. All of the lids I have received with this product fit great.
customer_reviews.author: darkestmortal

customer_reviews.title: Pyrex is Super
customer_reviews.text: I have several pieces of pyrex and did not buy this for myself, I bought for my daughter and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Avery

customer_reviews.title: Meets Expectations
customer_reviews.text: A quality, versatile set of glass baking dishes. My only complaint is that the lids are dishwasher safe for the top rack only, but the they don't fit very well on the top rack.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This is a Great Edition to all of my baking needs and storage keepers! Use it for just about anything!
customer_reviews.author: Al Meharg

customer_reviews.title: What a Bargain
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best set of glass baking and storage set I have ever purchased. Heavy duty, durable, goes in microwave and oven. All the pieces I need!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: The lids are a very poor fit for the glassware. They do not seal, and they barely even stay on. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Boggs

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about Pyrex products and the fact that most of them had lids also was just a major bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Matoke

customer_reviews.title: I have now bought 4 sets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and loved them. I liked them so much that I have now bought 3 more sets for other people as gifts. The handles make all the difference.
customer_reviews.author: kellyk

customer_reviews.title: Well made to last long!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these for a year and 3 months now, and have not had one problem with them. All the lids fit as they should the day I got them, and still fit now. Nothing has broken, scratched, or shattered on me. After reading some reviews, I was really afraid to handle them too roughly, but they are tough as nails. They've been banged, and bumped, and held up wonderfully. I love the handles, and the fitted lids. Keeps my cakes, breads, and casseroles fresh as can be! Love this set very much!
customer_reviews.author: kim g

customer_reviews.title: The easy grab handles are the best.
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like. It's has everything you need for baking and storage. The easy grab handles are the best. I bought this as a gift for my son. I will be buying myself a set.
customer_reviews.author: S. Beatie

customer_reviews.title: Really good set for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good set for the money! The bowl set and small serving bowls feel like a bonus. I have used the small "dessert" bowls for single serving leftovers. They fit right into a quart size baggie to store and heat up in the microwave nicely with a small paper plate or paper towel to cover. I also like the lids included although one of mine was cracked. I need to check on that.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set at a great price. I feel more comfortable using glass instead of plastic to store most foods and these work perfectly. We hand wash the lids (our preference) and put the containers in the dishwasher - top or bottom shelf - and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Upon Arrival
customer_reviews.text: First package arrived a day early, which was nice, until I lifted the box and could hear the broken glass shifting. So its going back, I'll gladly give Amazon a mulligan on this one, first real issue I've had with anything. Will update once new package arrives. Edit: After receiving the new shipment, and giving them for a x-mas gift, they have performed as expected under the light use they have seen thus far. The lids for the larger baking dishes is great for transporting.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Tops suck !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these moving into a new apartment didn't unbox them for a while and the window closed before I could write a review and return them, the glass is fine the tops SUCK two were broken when they arrived and two others have broken since !
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS E MYERS

customer_reviews.title: MISSING LIDS!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product BUT, I ordered the 19 piece set and only received 17 pieces. 2 of the lids for the bowls were missing. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. They can go from the oven to the table to the fridge. And when they're empty and cleaned, they stack neatly to put away until you need them again.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set
customer_reviews.text: This entire set is awesome and washes very well. They bake beautifully as well. The bowls are on the smaller size which are great for smaller portions, but they are not ideal sizes for making cake batter or mashed potatoes (hand mixer throws it everywhere due to small size).
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny I use this almost every day at my home
customer_reviews.author: Dells

customer_reviews.title: I personally don't like this shade at all
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife and she really likes them. Only wish that they would change the color of the blue. I personally don't like this shade at all, but thats just me.
customer_reviews.author: Lino412

customer_reviews.title: Love my set
customer_reviews.text: Love my set, arrived on time and was very well packaged! HOWEVER the only complaint I have is that, and this is why I only reason I gave 4 stars, is that everything was dirty, had a gross saw dust on everything, I wash my items before use anyways but I guess when you buy something new you expect to get it sterile and very clean, you shouldnt HAVE to clean it first you should just be able to do a quick wipe down with soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Rose

customer_reviews.title: ... busted in a thousand pieces from heat after removing sweet potato pie from the oven on broil to brown ...
customer_reviews.text: Im just thankful I wasn't in the room when the large cake pan busted in a thousand pieces from heat after removing sweet potato pie from the oven on broil to brown marshmallows. I imagine when it busted and shot 5 or 6 feet across the room it could have been in my eyes and cut me up. Just happened to be Christmas and I couldn't even go buy more. Very dangerous!.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Given as a graduation gift. She likes it so far and if there are any issues I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is so versatile and I love having the lid. I can make something, let it cool, pack it up and head to a party.
customer_reviews.author: SincereGiggles

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: good price, I should have bough a smaller set. I needed lids more than more vessels, this didn't have enough lids for even the items included, but I knew that and bought them anyway
customer_reviews.author: z3dsdead

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pyrex set
customer_reviews.text: Such a great investment, a perfect combination of multiple sizes!
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Absolute JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This set is the biggest piece of cr*p ever. Pyrex should be ashamed to have their name associated with it. The round bowls are fine but the rectangular ones need to go back to the drawing board. The lids for the Easy Grab dishes either fit loosely or literally pop off the dish within 15-20 seconds. I will be submitting a video review of this happening very soon. Pathetic product. Do not buy it if you are expecting the usual Pyrex quality. On top of the poor performance of the product, Pyrex has chosen to ignore my inquiries about correcting the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality set!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous set!! All the most frequently used sizes. Lids for almost every single piece. Nice thick glass and the handles are an excellent idea for ease of handling. The lids fit nice and snug but are not air-tight. I would highly recommend. Lots of quality pieces at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: The glass parts are great.....
customer_reviews.text: ...as you would expect from Pyrex. The lids of the round bowls are great too, hold everything in nicely. The lids on the rectangular dishes are not so great. Those dishes are very handy with their handles, but the lids are not tight, they pop off easily. Consider those lids one step above a sheet of aluminum foil. The good news is you can stack other (light) things on top of those lids when you need the space in the fridge, but if you tilt them over too far they're going to drip.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glassware set! I would buy another just because they're so easy to cook in and clean up. Not to mention you use a lot less dishes when you don't have to transfer leftovers into another container. Just snap a lid on and you're good to go :)
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn P.

product_meta.title: Pyrex Easy Grab 19-Piece Glass Bakeware Set with Blue Lids
product_meta.description:
Size:19-Piece

PYREX EASY GRAB 19-PIECE CLEAR GLASS BAKE SET
Since 1915, experienced cooks and beginners alike have reached for Pyrex glassware products. It all started with our glass bakeware - loved for generations because it's affordable, durable, odor and stain proof, and great for cooking, serving and storing. Since then, new favorites have joined old standbys. The Pyrex line now includes products for the entire kitchen, including pots and pans, metal bakeware, and kitchen tools and gadgets. They're all designed and proven to make cooking a little easier. Today, over 70 percent of U.S. homes have Pyrex glass products, with many cooks passing them down from generation to generation - which we think is pretty neat. 

Pyrex Fast Facts

- Pyrex glass bakeware is, and has always been, durable, reliable and safe. 

- The U.S. Consumer Products Safety Commission conducted an investigation in 2008 and concluded that Pyrex glass bakeware does not present a safety concern. 

- While both borosilicate and soda lime are appropriate compositions for glass bakeware, heat strengthened soda lime is more resistant to impact breakage.

- Pyrex glass bakeware has been made - first by Corning Incorporated and now by World Kitchen - using the same soda lime composition and heat-strengthening process for more than 60 years. 

- World Kitchen has always manufactured Pyrex glass bakeware in the U.S. and our packaging proudly displays the American flag and the "made in the USA" label. 

A great addition to any kitchen, this clear glass set lets you easily keep an eye on how your cakes, breads, casseroles and more are cooking up. Versatility makes it easier for you with these cook-and-serve in one dishes that go from the oven to the table. Use them for dry or refrigerated storage and microwave reheating and enjoy maximum functionality with minimal mess.

 * Easy Grab 19-Piece Bake Set includes one of each: 2-quart Oblong baking dish, 3-quart Oblong, 8-inch Square, 1.5-quart Loaf Dish - all with matching blue plastic covers. Also includes 1-quart , 1.5-quart, and 2.5-quart mixing bowls with matching blue plastic covers, 9.5-inch Pie Plate, and four 10-ounce Rimmed Custard Cups. 
 * Easy carry handles.
 * Soft contours for easy cleaning.
 * Contemporary design goes from oven to table.
 * Easy Snap Lid allows access to handles while lid is attached.
 * Non-porous glass won't absorb stains or odors. 
 * Glass is pre-heated oven, microwave, fridge, freezer, and dhiswasher safe. 
 * Made in the USA.
 * Limited 2-year warranty on oven bakeware. 
 * Limited 1-year warranty on plastic covers.
feature_bullets: Large ergonomic handles for improved handling
Easy snap on lid for secure transport
Nonporous glass won't absorb stains or odors
Reusable glass lasts longer than disposable plastic and foil
